channel.title: CVE Feed for 10Web -- Slider by 10Web
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 10Web -- Slider by 10Web

item.title: CVE-2024-32578|2024-08-02T02:13:39.990Z -- 10web -- slider%20by%2010web
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in 10Web Slider by 10Web allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Slider by 10Web: from n/a through 1.2.54.
